website_summaries.verdict: Low-price, lightweight binoculars that you don't need to worry about losing or damaging. Easy to carry in a pocket or backpack.
pros: Reliable magnification in a compact size
Easy to adjust eyepiece width, making these suitable for children or adults
cons: Other options have more durable builds and better magnification

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality, durable, nice storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Used and worked as expected, theu are good quality and durable. I love that it came in a nice case for storing. Overall happy with this specially for the price
customer_reviews.author: P.w

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with clear bright image
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sturdy, inexpensive good quality binoculars for a bat walk and this fit the bill perfectly. It can be handled easily by children which is part of the reason I wanted compact binoculars. It has a rubber covering which gives it a good grip and has a strap and carry case as well for ease of carrying. It also has an extremely handy pouch with a strap to attach to your belt (see picture). 10x25 was sufficient for our needs with a bright and clear image and we have been trying to use it more to spot the birds in our park as well as the local fox. Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bsprouts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described!
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars are great. I got these to use when travelling and sightseeing and I am really pleased as it is lightweight and easily portable which was just what I needed. It comes with a case for protection and a cleaning cloth to clean the lenses which is handy. It also has a strap to wear it around your neck and is easy for anybody to hold. These binoculars are well made, waterproof and easy to grip. The lenses are also high quality and you can see a magnified and clear view from far away. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ayaan Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight, optically sound no fuss binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the optical quality, smooth focusing and light weight of these inexpensive binoculars bought as a second pair for holiday travel and to keep in the car. Already have a pair of high end fully weather-proofed, nitrogen filled binoculars with the expected higher weight and much higher cost. A carry case is provided but no eyepiece covers supplied which I don't mind as I find them too fussy for quick use having used a pair of similar design Nikon travel binoculars with no supplied eyepiece covers for many years ready to go in the carry pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watts

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish Focus & view
customer_reviews.text: I can only comment on the binoculars I received from Amazon . The look & feel good quality - However the pair I received will not focus clearly - even after using the fine optical adjustment ring on the right hand lens ! The field of vision is also very narrow - given these issues these particular mini binoculars are NOT fit for purpose - Pity as the look great !
customer_reviews.author: CME

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic compact mini design with great view
customer_reviews.text: These binocluars are very lightweight and good for kids as well as adults. The rubber armour feels strong and gives a good grip, being waterproof is always a bonus. I got some great views in the huge grounds of bradgate park in leicestershire. Compact mini design is very good and easy for travel, pack in your pocket or handbag with ease
customer_reviews.author: k roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars have a high quality look and feel. They come complete with case, neck strap and cleaning cloth. Upon unboxing, I was more than impressed with the quality of the item and the view is quality through the lenses. My pictures do not do the magnification any justice but they do offer a decent level of magnification. I look forward to using these on my walks over the coming years.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Great Value for Money Binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are perfect for amateurs like me who need something compact and easy to use. They are well made and provide a clear view up to a thousand meters. They come with a handy pouch which can be attached to a belt and the package also includes a strap and lens cleaning cloth. I’m very happy with these binoculars which are great value for money. Off to the sea front now to do a bit of dolphin spotting!
customer_reviews.author: SARAH A.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Budget Pair Of Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars seem to be well made, are lightweight and not too bulky. You can easily put them in a jacket pocket comfortably. They have a hard rubber/resin surface and are easy to set up and use. The binoculars focus very easily and the optics are nice and sharp, I was very surprised. They also come with a neck strap, lens cleaning cloth, storage pouch that you can attach to your belt and instructions. To finalise they are very good and fit for purpose. The price of these binoculars is very good when compared to others. Grab yourself a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Karpinski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Lightweight simple to use Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: This product was a nice solid pair of binoculars with rubber grips and a ridged upper area which made it very easy to hold. It also fits very well in the hand and has an ergonomic shape. It comes with a very nice nylon pouch, and the build of the binoculars and the strap feels very good and long lasting. The binoculars work very well and focus on far off objects very well and make it seem like something which is hundreds of metres away is right before your very eyes with crystal clear clarity and you can see small details very well when using this product from far away. A very good buy for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear image.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of the image. For the price, I would say it's a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of these for watching garden birds but there was a long, black, plastic piece of swarf in one of the barrels. Returned for replacement pair. The second pair was really hard to adjust and no matter how hard I tried I could not get a good focus. They were not comfortable to hold and the hard plastic ends to the eyepiece soon hurt my eyelids. Needless to say, these were returned and an alternative brand purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Light duty, light weight, surprisingly good focus
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are small, lightweight and easy to handle. Super easy to focus, the swivel barrels can be positioned for child and adult eye-spacing. Pleased by the durable feel, like rubber. It is far Better than my expectation, handy and tiny binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: good images
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bigger than expected but still (large) pocket size. Also the supplied shoulder strap means it can be carried around with no bother. Controls a little stiff to adjust but image quality is good especially at close and medium range, and magnification is big for small binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: hugh s

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, Clean views, in a nice pocket size pair of Bins
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small pair of Bins for when i take the dog for a walk. I didn't want anything that i would have to wear around my neck to ruin my street cred. I also didn't want anything too small that looked like i got them out of a cracker, or had the magnification of two empty toilet rolls. I was therefore pleased to stumble upon these for just over £20. On the short list was a pair of Nikon, but at £60 felt it was too much to part with. So far, really pleased, great crisp image and pocket size.
customer_reviews.author: Milorodney

customer_reviews.title: Very useful due to their size and weight
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are great for my dad, who’s using them to watch the wildlife in the fields behind our house. They have a great 12x zoom, and yet weigh far less than most binoculars of this power, making then excellent for travel. The focusing is easy to do and creates a crystal clear image, letting us see very detailed images from incredible distances.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars arrived within 48 hours and were delivered on a Sunday. They are nice and small but still powerful enough to be very useful. The lightweight nature of them makes them easy to use . The focus control is well placed and has an easy glide motion . They come with a useful pouch that will clip onto your belt and even a cloth was supplied. All in all I would say that they represent very good value for money and come from a company that takes quality very seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good magnification
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to hold and set up. The Cary bag is convenient to keep it safe. However it is too powerful for my eyes. The lenses to look through is very tiny and we have to stress ourselves to view something. I was hurting my eyes everytime I tried watching through. I returned it as it didn't work for me, but it might not be the case everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Compact Binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: I like Apeman products, I bought a dash cam 2 years ago on Amazon and it’s still going strong. That’s why I thought I would try these binoculars. I was very very impressed, lightweight and excellent optical quality, and considering the magnification they are lovely to hold and focus on the subject you are viewing. These will get a lot of use, I won’t use my big binoculars now, these are so pocketable!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I now have three pairs of these small binoculars. I am a plane spotter and also a bird spotter, hence I have a pair in the car, a pair downstairs and a pair upstairs, you just never know when you are going to see something! I have had many small pairs of binoculars in my time, but todate, these are by far the best I have had for the money. I wear glasses, and these are very easy to use with them - very clear. Now my wife has never been able to get to grips with binoculars - with these, she has mastered it and now enjoys looking at things as well. Very good indeed! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lambypie18

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my international trip. The binoculars is small in size, yet powerful. I could clearly see houses on the build at least 2 miles away. You might see a black spot through the lens when you blink but that's due to incorrect settings. Make sure you calibrate it by reading the instructions. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Very good binoculars for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little fiddly to set the right eye but once done its done. For the money an excellent set of binoculars as long as you don’t try to compare them with ones costing $100 + they will focus from 10 feet to infinity, so very good in small gardens for watching birds. Very lightweight and easy to use, distance focus very good. A couple of things, not easy to use wearing glasses , but focused correctly you don’t need to wear them any way. I would have been happy to pay a little more for a better quality shoulder strap and lens protection covers
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are pretty decent and they bring things say 100 yards away much closer. But quality of image will be determined by how steady you can keep your hands. But realise for the money they are not going to produce a perfect image. But for say bird watching they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Johnd76

customer_reviews.title: Classic binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Classic binoculars! Reminded me of my childhood. Very nice easy product to use (if you have ever used one before!). The range is pretty good too as I tested it out in the neighbourhood (please do not invade anyone's privacy!). I am thinking of gifting it to a curious young mind.
customer_reviews.author: MR Usmani

customer_reviews.title: Good first pair of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a first buy, the magnification is a bit too high and theres a wobble in viewing because of that. The lens is small so produces a narrow field of vision but the quality is good for the price. Buying a larger lens, less magnification pair next, probably 8/10 x 50 is better
customer_reviews.author: Oakstaff

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Binoculars for Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Binoculars after reading the reviews so expected them to be good but that is an understatement they are fantastic. I own a nice pair of 8 x 42 Bins but wanted a smaller pair at a low cost to put in the car and take on Holidays and these fit the bill perfectly. Very happy with the purchase. Ordered them at 10am and they were delivered at 8pm the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Cardiffian1

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend these binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent binoculars, just wanted to use for walks and beach trips. My first time out with them was my local beach, we were delighted to see dolphins. Fantastic choice would recommend. Excellent quality & value for money. Fast postage and a follow up email also. Very pleased. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kelly h.

customer_reviews.title: handy little set
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for a friend and was so impressed when I tested them that I have bought another pair for myself. I use them to watch the birds in the garden and when I am on a dog walk. They are very good for the price, easy to adjust to different vision in each eye and the first pair ever than don't give me double vision. The magnifation is sufficient for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of searching picked up these and I am very happy as with any lensed goods you can spend a fortune and returns are not always that big a bang for your buck. I am very happy with these for watching the rugby as my old eyes are getting a bit knackered.
customer_reviews.author: N. Higham

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: These are so good for the price, the picture quality is incredible! I’ve never used binoculars before so I can’t compare them to a more expensive version but as a beginner these are ideal and you can see really far away
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Jay

customer_reviews.title: Realy are quality and Amazing clear picture
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but I’m amazed with the quality and picture through these , I’ve got some old binoculars which are brilliant that I have been look to get something with same quality picture and these are way better , truly am chuffed to bits with these
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value - Well Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars came the next day from placing my order, the quality is second to none, there is no fringing on the edges of the images and the build quality is A1 perfect, i would fully recommend these binoculars being a very good buy! This is a honest review by me having purchased and paid them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hissing Sid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great focus good price.
customer_reviews.text: I choose these binoculars as the reviews were good, I looked at a lot of binoculars before I got these. I'm so impressed with them, they are easy to adjust for both eyes, the focus is really sharp. Very pleased, good quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: K Webb

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars could have been REALLY good for their price, but mine came with their lenses damaged in both sides, which was unacceptable and very disappointing. Unfortunately, I had to return them and I'm still waiting for a refund...
customer_reviews.author: Jvnc84

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the casual observer and lightweight enough for walks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the casual observer and lightweight enough for walks. They are really very good compared to my heavyweight NIKON ones that I paid over £100 for years ago - the wonders of plastic & China......
customer_reviews.author: Sony User

customer_reviews.title: Good field glasses.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece of kit. Small, light & fits easily into any pack. The image is sharp & clear. 12x magnification is enough for nature watching & doesn't make the image too jerky for holding the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bufo

customer_reviews.title: Quality without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price, was expecting to have to pay double the price. Sutable for child or adult. Full instructions included on how to set them up. So pleased to find such a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: piglet

customer_reviews.title: Not very good image quality. Not sure if they are BAK4
customer_reviews.text: Not very good image quality. The image lacks clarity and sharpness. Not sure if they are BAK4. If you can return them it may be worth testing. In the end, I bought three pairs of different cheap binos and found only one of them had truly good optics. Buy and try until you find the right ones. Please note that somehow all three pairs had hundreds of 5 star reviews even though in reality these binoculars range from rubbish to good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why people get so excited about it. The quality it's just OK for the price. It needs quite a lot of frequent adjustment of the lens to get a good BUT NO crystal view.
customer_reviews.author: Reducto

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ,lightweight binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend these binoculars,they are lightweight ,easy adjustable dials for focusing and give a sharp image .I have been using them for birdwatching about 15 feet away in my garden .The detail I have observed in the birds markings has been very pleasing .They represent amazing value ,and come with a case ,neck strap and lens cleaning cloth .will be looking at Apeman products again !
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight binoculars with a great view
customer_reviews.text: Having just attended an opera and being far away from the stage i can testify to the excellent quality of these binoculars. They are so clear you can see every vivid detail of the actors' expressions. Can highly recommend. I have also used them looking at the birds in the garden. Very light and easy to hold and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Iwolff

customer_reviews.title: Not for my liking
customer_reviews.text: Needing to squint to hold a clear picture. Don’t fit the eyes we’ll have to really push your eyes in and squint. My partner and friends have the same experience. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Jade

customer_reviews.title: APEMAN 12X25 Compact Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of binoculars, easy to focus great range and there also good for focusing on quite close objects as well, I can't see you getting better for around £20 if you want some budget binoculars don't hesitate just get these .
customer_reviews.author: oscar wild

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Had searched for a good quality relatively small pair of binoculars for just general use when out walking etc. could not more pleased for the money. Balancing size against magnification was proving tricky until I looked at these and their reviews. I have to say they are excellent; great vision and so easy to use, focus is light and easy while looking through and the extending eye cups are perfect if your in bright sunlight to prevent glare in the eye piece. Would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mark D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value for Money!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on day promised and nicely packaged. These binoculars were easy to focus with the assistance of enclosed instructions. Quality is excellent and very happy with everything. Great value for money. Sellers are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Useful binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Useful binoculars. They are small and compact, so require a bit of adjusting (it allows adjusting) to fit your eyes properly. It shows clearly up to about 1000m as advertised. Recommended for light use and we got it for our upcoming holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas present for small granddaughter but only had light use to date. Useful at local nature reserve, and at the coast. They will be more useful in a year or too. Seem to be well made, not brilliant optics, but suitable for a budding bird watcher.
customer_reviews.author: Dr AY

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: You can trust me as I paid for these out of my own pocket and I'm very happy to say that I would happily pay for them again. Much better than my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: MR A

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for an explorer daughter who is loving is day and night. tried it once myself, the zoom is good and clear. So yes it passes the test.
customer_reviews.author: umzyi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pocket-sized binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I got these so they'd fit in my (large) pocket when we go out for walks and they do. The vision is clear and the focus is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for bird watching
customer_reviews.text: Bought for watching the birds feeding from our garden bird feeders. Picture quality is sharp and detailed. Easy to use for a 6 and 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: TMW

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cant complain for the price. Nicely packaged, seem to be well put together, lightweight, nice grip with the rubberised body. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: darrel price

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my partner, because he always talked of wanting one to see better the moon from our rooftop.I searched online and based on the reviews I decided on this Apeman.It was a great decision! We are pleased with it!The quality is really good! It's a good quality-price ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Toader

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for family walks. Just wish strap was a bit steadier as it's very thin and digs in to your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are excellent quality they are very lightweight. They are very easy to use with very clear optics. I Can see these binoculars lasting a long time with durable construction they been used outside for sightseeing.
customer_reviews.author: Nus

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A slender good looking set of binoculars. The feel of them makes you feel like you know what your doing (I don't do bird watching mainly used for motorcycle racing) they work brilliantly the carry case is robust and it comes with a strap just incase it slips out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Collier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are awesome. They have good magnification, the images quality is very good, on par with my olympus binoculars and seem to be well built. Could not have asked for anything more for the price. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hitgirl

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Just received binoculars. Compact, although I have large hands the binoculars shape fits perfectly. Fairly light weight means there is less shake. Clear image, also has extending eye pieces. I have a pair of Nikon 10 x 50, they are heavy and bulky to carry around. I tend to leave them in the car. These are perfect to string round your neck and carry around. I would say the image quality is on a par with my Nikon's. The only difference is the field of view 12 x 25. I can live with that. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: good binoculars
customer_reviews.text: easy to focus, pretty clear view, a bit heavy for long term holding, strong smell from the plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely clear and great durability
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of binoculars for bird watching and to replace a really cheap pair I had. These binoculars surpassed my expectations and really showed how bad my previous pair were. I can't recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: PixelDonkey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and sturdy. Easy to carry and very good value for money. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Feisal R

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight Binos
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight binos easy to put in your bag and forget about them until needed. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: wool

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: As I have only just received them I am unable to give much of a review. However I have checked them over and they give good quality images and are lightweight and compact which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: great binoculars, compact and absolutely amazing for travelling and hiking
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly lovely. They are light weight, the focus and zoom are just perfect and are super easy to carry on hikes and long walks. Have had several binoculars over the last few years (some of which much more expensive than these ones) and I have to admit that the Apeman's pair is proper stuff. Highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Light and cheap binoculars but very clear. Don't be put off by the cheap price they are good but have to be looked after as MIGHT not be as robust as far more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME.... Great value.. *****
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a cheap pair of binoculars for fishing. I was looking for a small pair to fit in my tackle box... WOW what a great pair of binoculars for the money, I was made up with them. Small compact light weight with great magnification. Easy to set up,come with a black protective case. Ordered several pairs now for the lads I fish with....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear vision and light
customer_reviews.text: I like these binoculars because they are light and pleased with the case to carry them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab and value for money great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift brilliant compact binoculars easy to use and great price to
customer_reviews.author: miss jessica c lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant buy.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant buy for the price, top quality pair of binoculars, light and portable, good focus, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: M Walker

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little pair of binos, very quick and easy to adjust to one's sight. We'll worth the dosh 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how good these Bino's are for the price. Crisp, clear image and easy to use. The only (very) minor niggle is the field of view which is quite narrow, but for the price they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ed_W

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Gift purchase and the family are very happy with these binoculars
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: apeman
customer_reviews.text: For the money these outperform many more expensive units..a real gem..nice packaging and very well made..optics are very good ..highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very robust
customer_reviews.text: My nephews were giving them the treatment that boys do with new items lol very durable and robust works well great magnification and lots of fun for the kids spotting new things that otherwise they would scare away
customer_reviews.author: Tony jones

customer_reviews.title: Great customer care
customer_reviews.text: Great product. While a lense cracked within the first two days due to some typical handling by my 4 year old, I was very kindly offered a replacement which was great customer service. Greater care will be taken this time around as these are real binoculars and not a plastic toy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Loved these binoculars. I'm using them for birdwatching, - feathered kind -, the magnification is so good it turns a blue tit into the size of a starling. The focus wheel is so easy. All in all a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sharp-focus, lightweight binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars were bought for bird watching and are top quality. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good handsized binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Good hand-sized binoculars and not too heavy and nice little case. Easy to alter for individual users and good to use for wildlife watching.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chandler-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant binoculars. Bought them for our holiday cruising the fjords in Norway. They were excellent. Good , sharp focus once one got to grips with how to adjust. Would recommend - excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs AM Shorter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for bird watching
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic binoculars. Easy to set up and lovely for bird watching
customer_reviews.author: Susan James

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive pair of binoculars to keep on my boat, These fit the bill perfectly, Reasonably priced, Decent quality, compact and protected by a case, Job done. Capn Deck
customer_reviews.author: 566Derek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity
customer_reviews.text: Brought these to enhance our daily lockdown walks and they are perfect. Small enough to carry easily in hand (a tiny bit big for trouser pockets) and excellent picture quality for the price, almost as good as my big "proper" pair and way better than the first cheap pair I brought for £5 less.
customer_reviews.author: My dad says

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very good binoculars. Bought specially for having better vision on golf tournaments and the picture is very good. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Ales

customer_reviews.title: It’s all worth the buy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my little one. This was the most favourite of all gifts that she got. It comes with all accessories that you need . Very light and excellent magnification of the view. We even used it to watch the craters of the full moon. An ideal gift for a budding astronaut!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present for my nephew.. great product and nice handy size very good quality He loved them
customer_reviews.author: Helene Kell

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are amazing. They feel and operate like a pair of bins which might be 5 times the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bell

customer_reviews.title: Small and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and they are always in my rucksack ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Salt

customer_reviews.title: Goos
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Good quality Hard to hold still for perfect views
customer_reviews.author: lil

customer_reviews.title: Clear and sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to use, impressed with the focus
customer_reviews.author: Wayne iPhone X

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Superb binoculars. Look and feel great quality. Compact with excellent optics. Perfect for travelling around with on holiday or walking.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN

customer_reviews.title: They arrived broke
customer_reviews.text: There is no magnification, these arrived completely broke and useless. I must of received an incorrectly made pair as these have no purpose, they don't expand properly and you cannot use them
customer_reviews.author: Alice Baylis

customer_reviews.title: Really Excellent Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Would highly highly recommend. Picture is great. Has excellent focusing range. Really good design and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Kent

customer_reviews.title: Stupendous binoculars for the price -- WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT binoculars esp. considering the price, and my son adores them! Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Lit Luvah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Compact, portable and easy to use. The lenses are very high quality, especially for the price. The focus is easy to use and the image is crystal clear. The binoculars are very sturdy and I love the little carry pack that you can fit on your belt as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: loverly binoculars well made great company
customer_reviews.text: Loverly binoculars the first pair had a crack on an internal lens caused in transit. Yukio at Treasureu was awesome dealing with the issues I had i would advise buying from this company really helpful. My 8 year old loves his birthday present a very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: mr daniel gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice compact binoculars. There is a nice rubber coating for grip. They are very good for focusing at varied distances without much fiddling. Very pleased with them. They were a little bit bigger than I imagined, but not a problem. Still very compact. Very good value. The manufacturer also sent me FREE a pair of 10 x 42. Will give them to the hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pair of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to adjust both the viewer and focus. Has a good range with clear image. Nice grip on the binoculars, lovely case with instructions. Overall I’m happy with this purchase - good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised at how far you can see with these! Reveals details not seen with the naked eye. Very fun and easy to operate for a total beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Great little binoculars. Excellent bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the optics on these binoculars. They are also very ergonomic to hold, compact and light. In my opinion you won't find a better set for the money. I use them for looking at wildlife, shipping, aircraft, stargazing etc. They are superb for all of the above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Very good binoculars.The advantage is that it is very small and has a very clean image.It fits in your pocket and is very easy to adjust to your eyes.12x magnification is optimal.
